node.name: Ultra sided Pet Bed MAKE: MYSENSE INC
node.description: Hand sewn and foam pellets filling for the ultra soft experience. No reusable material is chosen for making this pet bed, as mostly seen in other brands. Reversible design provides year round comfort in any type of weather or climate. (SIZE: 810x740x190mm / WEIGHT: 2 Kg / MATERIAL: Canvas Fabric)
node.content:
1. Double-layer durable canvas is hand-sewn so that possibility to get tore by a dog or cat gets reduced.
2. Extra 2 pillows are provided for play as done by young dogs.
3. Large longitudinal oval size provides enough space for big size breeds like Mastiff and Saint Bernard.
4. Extra foam pellets are provided at the edges for cushioning the bed and not in the bottom which creates a nested shape while sleeping.
5. Easily washed with soapy water and get dry within daylight while in winter it takes 2 days.
6. Suitable for one big dog and else for 2 small dogs or kittens.
node.alt: Hiputee Ultra Soft Reversible FleeceVelvet Bed for Dog and Cat with 2 Extra Pillows Large Brown Black

node.name: Medium orthopaedic Pet Bed MAKE: MYSENSE INC
node.description: Ultra-soft fabric and nest-like walls filled that surround pets to promote feelings of security. Easy to clean, durable, and lightweight design. Easy to relocate indoor-outdoor, water-resistant bottom padding, and space for two adult dogs. (SIZE: 940x600x50mm / WEIGHT: 1.5 Kg / MATERIAL: Velvet Canvas)
node.content:
1. Pet loves clean areas and it is good practice if owners dry clean their bed regularly.     
2. Orthopaedic design with a covering of canvas fabric suits the Indian climate, given that it should be just right for hot summer months & cozy enough for those mild to heavy winter months.
3. With an anti-skid and waterproof base, it is excellent to handle play full breed like a german shepherd and especially younger pups.
4. Consume less water for wash and pet saliva stain repellent.
5. Suitable for both types of pet, cat, and dog, and size is good enough for two adult dogs.
node.alt: Mellifluous Medium Size Dog and Cat Rectangular Pet Bed Brown

node.name: Sided Pet Bed MAKE: ADITYA ENTERPRISES
node.description: Stylish yet simplistic design offers the highest level of comfort for pet and high grade raw material that ensures durability. Premium quality of polyester and this pet bed can be used indoor as well as outdoor because of water resistance base.(SIZE: 600x450x230mm / WEIGHT: 2 Kg / MATERIAL: Velvet Polyester)
node.content:
1. Dog usually sleep longer than a cat but on average both pets can sleep up to 10 hours and maybe that’s why their bed must be different than humans once.   
2. Pet can't sleep straight and that’s why they need a cozy shape like an oval in which the comfort factor is a bit higher.
3. This all-season pet bed has temperature-responsive filling which remains cooler in summer and warmer in winter.
4. Scratch-proof covering of velvet polyester can handle big nails of dogs and one of the sharpest of cats.
5. Odour and stain proof which meant with the puppies and kitten 'Potty' in their early days.
6. Easily cleaned using vacuum cleaners and covering fabric is repellent against pet hairs.
7. Spacious for single dog and cat or else two puppies and kitten.
node.alt: Gorgeous Soft Reversible Cats and Dogs Bed Small

node.name: Large Sideless Pet Bed MAKE: MYSENSE INC
node.description: Ergonomically design with modern space spacing style that can perfectly make more noticeable homes too. Soft, breathable fabric, attractive color option, and the perfect size for an adult dog or cat. This sideless bed manages all types of sleeping postures made by any dog or cat. (SIZE: 1000x1000x250mm / WEIGHT: 3 Kg / MATERIAL: Velvet Fabric)
node.content:
1. Similar to people, all pets whether dog or cat sleep differently, some enjoy curling up tightly in a ball, others enjoy a little extra legroom.
2. Fluffy round shape is appreciated by most of the pets as usually seen in most of the dog's sleep curling.
3. This bed has three feet in diameter that is enough for an adult dog but be sure to measure pets while they are in a sleeping position and add a few lengths in order to ensure the bed is comfortable.
4. Holland velvet fabric is used for outer covering, with the same specifications and quality standards. 
5. Easy to wash with soapy water or dry clean using vacuum cleaner for pet hair collection.
6. Reversible design fits both hot and cold weather conditions.
7. Users who already purchased this bed suggested breeds like Kanni, Indian spitz, and Bhutia for best use.
node.alt: Mellifluous XXLarge Size Cat and Dog Reversible Pet Bed PeachGrey
